mapper.select: Select QN_SN, ORG_CD, OPER_CD, SURVEY_SN, SURVEY_CD, SURVEY_NM, QN_TYPE, QN_CD, QN_SE, QN_GRP, QN_NM, P_QN_CD, EX_TYPE, EX_TYPE_TXT, RM, USE_AT, REG_DT, REGUSR, UPD_DT, UPDUSR, QN_EXPLN_TYPE, QN_EXPLN From Survey_qn Where Survey_sn = 1 And Survey_cd = '건강영향(성인)' AND USE_AT = 'Y' Order By Qn_cd

Select QN_EX_SN, QN_SN, ORG_CD, OPER_CD, SURVEY_SN, SURVEY_CD, SURVEY_NM, QN_CD, EX_CD, EX_TYPE, EX_QN_LINK, EX_NM, EX_TXT1_UNIT, EX_TXT2_UNIT, EX_IMG_LINK, RM, USE_AT, REG_DT, REGUSR, UPD_DT, UPDUSR, EX_INNER_AT, EX_CLASS1, EX_CLASS2, EX_GROUP, EX_SUB_DISPLAY, IS_DISABLE, DISABLE_TARGET From Survey_qn_ex Where Survey_sn = 1 And Survey_cd = '건강영향(성인)' AND USE_AT = 'Y' Order By Qn_cd,Ex_cd

SELECT B.ANS_VALUE,B.ANS_TXT1, B.ANS_TXT2, A.* FROM SURVEY_QN_EX A, (SELECT * FROM SURVEY_ANS WHERE SURVEY_ANS_MST_SN = #{surveyAnsMstSn} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND SURVEY_SN = 1) B WHERE A.QN_CD = B.QN_CD(+) AND A.EX_CD = B.EX_CD(+) AND A.SURVEY_SN = 1 ORDER BY A.QN_CD, A.EX_CD

SELECT B.ANS_VALUE,B.ANS_TXT1, B.ANS_TXT2, A.* FROM SURVEY_QN_EX A, (SELECT * FROM SURVEY_ANS WHERE SURVEY_ANS_MST_SN = #{surveyAnsMstSn} AND USE_AT = 'T' AND SURVEY_SN = 1) B WHERE A.QN_CD = B.QN_CD(+) AND A.EX_CD = B.EX_CD(+) AND A.SURVEY_SN = 1 ORDER BY A.QN_CD, A.EX_CD

Select Qn.Qn_type, Qn.Qn_cd, Qn.Qn_nm, Qn.P_qn_cd, Qn.Ex_type, Ex.Ex_type As Ex_type2, Ex.Ex_cd, Ex_qn_link, Ex.Ex_nm, Ex.Ex_txt1_unit, Ex.Ex_txt2_unit, Ex.Ex_img_link From Survey_qn Qn, Survey_qn_ex Ex Where Qn.Survey_sn = 1 And Qn.Survey_cd = '건강영향(성인)' And Qn.Qn_cd = Ex.Qn_cd AND Qn.USE_AT = 'Y' AND Ex.USE_AT = 'Y' Order By Qn.Qn_cd
